name: OOX: Send Offer
title: Send Offer for NFT
description: Send an offer to purchase a specific NFT. The NFT owner can accept your offer.

inputs.name: NFT Identifier
inputs.description: The token identifier of the NFT you want to buy.

inputs.name: NFT Nonce
inputs.description: The nonce of the NFT you want to buy.

inputs.name: NFT Amount
inputs.description: The amount of NFTs to buy (for SFTs, use 1 for NFTs).

inputs.name: Deadline
inputs.description: Offer deadline timestamp (Unix timestamp in seconds).

inputs.name: NFT Owner
inputs.description: The address of the NFT owner.

inputs.name: Payment
inputs.description: Your offer payment amount in the payment token.
